moves.6... Nd7: Clearing the way for long castle
moves.9. h3 Bxf3: If ...Bh4 he can move g4. At g6 my B would not be very effective
moves.11... O-O-O:
Joining the Rs and placing a R on open file
another nice move is BxN
moves.13. e5 Bxc3 14. bxc3:
White has very weak Q side
Should have done something to avoid this breakup
moves.15. Bd2: Although W has 2 Bs but deployment of dark knights is far better
moves.15... Na4: Idea is to win an exchange
moves.18. Kf2 Nxc3 19. Bxc3 Rxc3: Blk wins material plus more positional advantage
moves.21. Rad1:
This allows a small tactic.
21 RxR KxR Rc1 (Rd1 and Rd2) is a possibility but its looks like W cant save the game.

Position is simplified.
W has no advantage no counter no compensation

Advancing and stopping a4

moves.25. Kd3 c5:
Stopping the K.
